metadata.title: Pressure Data Collated as part of the PMEL Data Rescue Efforts

creators.name: Atmospheric Research (OAR), Pacific Marine Environmental Laboratory (PMEL)

metadata.description: Current meters were deployed by the Coastal Physics group of the Pacific Marine Environmental Labs to assess sediment transport,  flow regimes and environmental quality in coastal waters in Puget Sound, the California Bight, Yangtze River. Data collected included currents, temperature and salinity.
